channel.title: Help Making An Online Downloadable Client
channel.description: hello moparscape i recently downloaded runeshy pkz and want to know how to get it online to a downloadable client that other people can connect to i know its a skid question any help would be nice.

item.title: Help Making An Online Downloadable Client
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

  1. Program your client.
  2. Beta test and make sure it works 100%.
  3. Compile.
  4. Delete source files and other unneeded crap.
  5. Zip client. Optional: Jar and ob your client.
  6. Upload to your friends.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Making An Online Downloadable Client
